headline: Is BT Partnership Expanding SMB-Focused AI Security Changing the Investment Case for CrowdStrike (CRWD)?
summary: BT Group recently announced a partnership with CrowdStrike Holdings to launch BT Business Antivirus Detect and Respond, a new AI-powered cybersecurity service built on CrowdStrike's Falcon Go platform, specifically targeting UK small and medium-sized businesses with 24/7 managed support. This collaboration not only expands CrowdStrike's European reach, but also addresses the critical gap in advanced security for SMBs by pairing accessible AI-native protection with expert local service. Now,...
